# Pogorzel, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Pogorzel  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Gołdap, within Gołdap County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland, close to the border with the Kaliningrad Oblast of Russia.
Location
It lies approximately  south-east of Gołdap and  east of the regional capital Olsztyn.
